Package services

Class PatientService

java.lang.Object
services.PatientService
public class PatientService extends Object
Service class to manage operations related to patients.

This class handles functionalities like adding new patients, retrieving patient details, and maintaining the consistency between in-memory data and persistent storage (CSV file).

    • PatientService

      public PatientService(UserService userService)
      Constructor for the `PatientService` class.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • addPatient

      public void addPatient(Patient patient)
      Adds a new patient to the system.

      If the patient does not already exist, the patient is added to the in-memory data structure and saved to the CSV file. Otherwise, a message is displayed indicating that the patient already exists.

      Parameters:
      patient - The `Patient` object to be added.

    • getPatientById

      public Patient getPatientById(String hospitalID)
      Retrieves a patient by their unique hospital ID.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The unique ID of the patient to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The `Patient` object if found; `null` otherwise.

    • updatePatientContact

      public boolean updatePatientContact(String hospitalID, String newContactInformation, String contactType)
      Updates a patient's contact information (phone or email) based on the specified contact type. If a medical record exists for the patient, the corresponding record is also updated.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The unique ID of the patient whose contact information is being updated.
      newContactInformation - The new contact information (phone number or email address).
      contactType - The type of contact information to update ("phone" or "email").
      Returns:
      true if the patient's contact information is successfully updated; false if the patient is not found.

    • listAllPatients

      public void listAllPatients()
      Lists all patients and their details. This method is primarily for administrators to view a summary of all patients.

      Prints the following details for each patient: - Patient ID - Name - Date of Birth - Gender - Blood Type - Contact Information
